name: Ext_R4B_MedicationAdministration_reasonCode
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.MedicationAdministration.reasonCode for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationAdministration.reasonCode from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationAdministration|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: A code indicating why the medication was given.
element.comment: `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `MedicationAdministration.reasonCode` maps to R5 `MedicationAdministration.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A set of codes indicating the reason why the MedicationAdministration was made.
